metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16114 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The marked module is vulnerable to a regular expression denial of service. Based on the information published in the public issue, 1k characters can block for around 6 seconds.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
node-marked - 0.3.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-marked package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.3.9+dfsg-1').
